============================================

---------Hearts of Iron2 NWO-Finest Hour1942---------

<
===================1.3==================================


=======Fall, 1942, Nazi Germany was at the height of it's might...============

==================Units stat====================

===========================Turn Order========================

Germany./ Russia./ Italy./ UK./ MinorAxis./ U.S.

===recommended special house rules====
no restriciton on tier units in this version;
--Tech:(use eidt, save/reload to obtain, deduct total amount before roll, so save
some IPC every rd if players intends to do so)
Germany is allowed to purchase supersub/rocket for a total of 30IPC each
American is allowed to purchase HB/LR/DestBB for a total of 50/30/30 IPC
UK LR+HB=30/40IPC
---enviroment:
Russian player can declare one winterStorm after rd1(Prior to German combat move).
during the winter rd, all units on Russian territories move -1, and no planes shall take off.
--------------------------------

======a Lebowski Scenario, map modified from NWO================
